arts.ttl: Unai Emery wants to see 'more and more and more' from Marcus Rashford after loan star's 'fantastic' cameo in Aston Villa's victory over Chelsea
arts.sum: Villa's decision to take Rashford from Man United for the rest of the season raised eyebrows. But he has now three assists to his name and has become a hero for the Holte End.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa 2-1 Chelsea: Player ratings as Jorgensen howler hands Blues defeat
arts.sum: Villa tied things up ten minutes into the second half when Marco Asensio bundled home Marcus Rashford's cut-back, and it was the hosts who looked most likely to grab a winner. SUB: Marcus Rashford (46' for Ramsey)

arts.ttl: 'Holte End have a new hero' - Rashford shines in Aston Villa win
arts.sum: Marcus Rashford inspires Aston Villa to a comeback victory over Chelsea, providing assists for both of Marco Asensio's goals.

arts.ttl: Youri Tielemans makes Marcus Rashford and Marco Asensio Aston Villa transfer admission
arts.sum: Aston Villa midfielder Youri Tielemans has said that both Marcus Rashford and Marco Asensio will be important for the side in their hopes of playing Champions League football again next season, with the Belgian hinting he hopes for a permanent move for both in the summer. “It helps us a lot when you see the two of them linking up for both goals, they’re very important for today and for the rest of the season,” Tielemans told Sky Sports after the game.

arts.ttl: Jamie Redknapp slams 'AWFUL' Filip Jorgensen's mistake against Aston Villa - but Enzo Maresca claims that Chelsea's error-ridden keepers are NOT a problem
arts.sum: Marcos Asensio's winning goal came after the ball slipped through Jorgensen's arms, with the shot stopper having recently taken Robert Sanche'z spot in Chelsea XI.

arts.ttl: Marcus Rashford forces Jamie Redknapp to complete massive U-turn live on Sky Sports
arts.sum: Marcus Rashford came off the bench to provide two assists for Aston Villa versus Chelsea as the Midlands side came from behind to earn victory over Enzo Maresca's team at Villa Park

arts.ttl: Aston Villa boss explains what he is giving back to Marcus Rashford after Man United struggles
arts.sum: Unai Emery insists he will continue to be demanding of Marcus Rashford after the Manchester United loanee's impressive start to life at Aston Villa. Enzo Fernandez opened the scoring for Chelsea in the ninth minute before Asensio equalised not long after the start of the second half.

arts.ttl: Redknapp hails Rashford as Aston Villa's 'new hero'
arts.sum: Jamie Redknapp praised the work Aston Villa did in the January transfer window to bring in Marcus Rashford and Marco Asensio as the pair combined twice in Saturday's crucial 2-1 win over Chelsea.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa fans say two players were truly ‘immense’ alongside Marco Asensio and Marcus Rashford in win over Chelsea
arts.sum: Aston Villa gave their hopes of European qualification a shot in the arm thanks to their 2-1 win over Chelsea on Saturday evening. New Aston...

arts.ttl: Marcus Rashford and Marco Asensio are making the right impression on Unai Emery
arts.sum: The recent arrivals combined to turn defeat into victory for Aston Villa against Chelsea on Saturday.
